properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 19 at 2:16PM AKST until February 21 at 3:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Snow accumulations of 8 to 12
inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph.

* WHERE...Klondike Highway above 1000 feet, including White Pass.

* WHEN...From 6 AM Thursday to 3 AM AKST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Areas of
blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong
winds could cause tree damage.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall will peak in intensity late
Thursday morning before diminishing late Thursday. Areas near
sea level will remain all rain.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit
511.alaska.gov.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THURSDAY TO 3 AM AKST FRIDAY
